name: Soundwaves
description:
In this 5 level game you use sounds and soundwaves to your advantage, as you are mostly blind.

By clicking, or pressing the spacebar, you can shoot out soundwaves, these soundwaves will help you see where the walls of the level are!

Art credit goes to: Me, MIT, GarboMuffin, and Cocrea.

MUSIC USED:

Credit for the music goes to GaMetal, and Nintendo.
